reviews.review: I was so afraid this movie wouldn't live up to the hype, but oh boy, it was amazing. Bringing all the teams  together went smoothly and was really enjoyable. It's amazing how Marvel blends all those different genres (Guardians of The Galaxy, Thor, Avengers...) together in a coherent masterpiece. This movie left me in awe and desperately aching for more. It was a perfect blend of emotional and humoristic scenes. All the superheroes got their chance to shine. I'm definitely going to see this movie again - it's even better than Black Panther. Best movie in a looooong time.

I'm amazed at what this fit into this movie without it feeling like they were missing to much.
I don't know if it's because I'm a huge fan of the Infinity war comic or because I've been ecstatic to finally see the MCU fully flourish. 
However this is the best movie of the series so far.

One of the most thoroughly entertaining movies I’ve ever seen. Requires the context of the rest of the series, so those who haven’t seen many Marvel movies may be lost. Thanos is a great villain who is scarily logical. Probably among the best of the Marvel movies, if not the best.
Dumpster fire, no resolution to anything. Better to skip this and then see both movies next year.

Amazing display of every character’s ability. Great script. This movie is a heist movie from a different point of view. Loved every second of it. Lot of parts left the crowd amazed and surprised. Will definitely watch a few more times.

It's a awesome mcu movie, this movie is like the cherry on top of the mcu, it's both funny and serious, the actions are fun and thanos is amazing, it got some unexpected plot points but i got a bit dissapointed for the following reasons, 1 the ending is a bit rushed and 2 the fighting (spoilers) took place in different locations with different heroes, its like each hero got its own goal throughout the movie its like a game.

Thanos is the main boss in a planet
And
The army war that took place in wakanda is like a pair of stages that the characters had too face.
amazing ,i have no words for it ,describable.the ending was really amazing,i cannot explain it,it was really serious
Amazing. Wish we didn’t have to wait a year.
